name: Security Criteria
selectValues: Successful attack like SQL injection, Cross site scripting, Portscan, backdoor entry detected on Firewall/IPS
Successful connection is observed on network or wintel devices from a Rouge/blacklisted IP
Virus outbreak observed on network affecting a process or > 50 systems within 24 hours
Observed virus infection on system, followed by successful connection on Firewall/IPS
Trojan activities detected on production servers
Ability to access Project Safeguard sites
Connection indicating Towards OR From Ransomware
Active syn flood attack detected by network
Trojan Infected packets that were allowed inside the network
